text: @realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews In KY people are still waiting in 8 hour lines for unemployment and Texas/Florida are doing nothing about setting coronavirus records. Chaz and chop are peacefully protesting and feeding the homeless. Maybe you should worry about the right things.
